name: splitting axe
description: This is a large, blunted two-handed wood splitting axe, designed for splitting logs, not felling trees.  It makes a good melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.

name: 8lb sledge hammer
description: A large, 8lb hammer head on a wooden handle.  Makes an acceptable melee weapon for the very strong, but is nearly useless in the hands of the weak.

name: fire axe
description: This is a large, two-handed pickhead axe normally used by firefighters.  It makes a powerful melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.

name: 8lb sledge hammer
description: A large, 8lb hammer head on a fiberglass handle. Makes an acceptable melee weapon for the very strong, but is nearly useless in the hands of the weak.

name: 10lb sledge hammer
description: A large, 10lb hammer head on a wooden handle. Makes an acceptable melee weapon for the very strong, but is nearly useless in the hands of the weak.

name: 10lb sledge hammer
description: A large, 10lb hammer head on a fiberglass handle.  Makes an acceptable melee weapon for the very strong, but is nearly useless in the hands of the weak.

name: 4lb sledge hammer
description: A fairly small, 4lb hammer head on a 15 inch fiberglass handle.  Makes a better melee weapon than its larger cousins.

name: flathead axe
description: This is a large, two-handed flathead axe, like a fire axe normally used by firefighters but without the pick edge.  It makes a powerful melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.

name: fire maul
description: A huge, blunted axe head on one side and a sledgehammer head on the other. Like a splitting maul but designed specifically for firefighters.  It makes a powerful melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.

name: felling axe
description: This is a large, sharpened two-handed felling axe, designed for felling trees but not chopping wood.  It makes a good melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.

name: splitting maul
description: A huge, blunted axe head with a sledgehammer head opposite. Not very good at cutting but very good at splitting wood and smashing zombie skulls, if you can handle the weight.

name: pulaski axe
description: A dual-use tool often used in forestry, the pulaski is a combination fire axe on one side and a mattock blade (or adze) on the other, atop a long wooden handle. The pulaski can do everything a pickheaded-axe can as well as dig like a mattock.

name: pulaski axe
description: A dual-use tool often used in forestry, the pulaski is a combination fire axe on one side and a mattock blade (or adze) on the other, atop a long fiberglass handle. The pulaski can do everything a pickheaded-axe can as well as dig like a mattock.

name: mcleod tool
description: A forestry tool, with a double-headed rake/hoe. Makes a good melee weapon but is very hard to store.  You can use it to turn tillable land into a slow-to-cross pile of dirt, or dig a shallow pit.

name: 5lb cutter mattock
description: A cutter mattock combines an adze and an axe in one tool, atop a long wooden handle. An evolution of the simple pickaxe, a mattock is primarily an agricultural tool used for digging, hoeing, chopping and, in the case of the cutter mattock, cutting with the axe head.

name: 2.5lb cutter mattock
description: A cutter mattock combines an adze and an axe in one tool, atop a long wooden handle. An evolution of the simple pickaxe, a mattock is primarily an agricultural tool used for digging, hoeing, chopping and, in the case of the cutter mattock, cutting with the axe head.

description: A cutter mattock combines an adze and an axe in one tool, atop a long fiberglass handle. An evolution of the simple pickaxe, a mattock is primarily an agricultural tool used for digging, hoeing, chopping and, in the case of the cutter mattock, cutting with the axe head.

name: small cutter mattock
description: A cutter mattock combines an adze and an axe in one tool, atop a small, 15 inch fiberglass handle. An evolution of the simple pickaxe, a mattock is primarily an agricultural tool used for digging, hoeing, chopping and, in the case of the cutter mattock, cutting with the axe head.

name: 5lb pick mattock
description: A pick mattock combines an adze and a pickaxe in one tool, atop a long wooden handle. An evolution of the simple pickaxe, a mattock is primarily an agricultural tool used for digging, hoeing, and chopping.

name: 2.5lb pick mattock
description: A pick mattock combines an adze and a pickaxe in one tool, atop a long wooden handle. An evolution of the simple pickaxe, a mattock is primarily an agricultural tool used for digging, hoeing, and chopping.

description: A pick mattock combines an adze and a pickaxe in one tool, atop a long wooden handle. An evolution of the simple pickaxe, a mattock is primarily an agricultural tool used for digging, hoeing, and chopping.
